title: Martin Bashir Apologizes To Princess Diana’s Sons In Aftermath Of Independent Inquiry; Denies Deceiving Royal To Secure 1995 Interview
content:
1. Martin Bashir Apologizes To Princess Diana’s Sons In Aftermath Of Independent Inquiry; Denies Deceiving Royal To Secure 1995 Interview  Deadline
  2. Sarah Palin, familiar with Martin Bashir's 'unethical' reporting, hails 'justice' after Princess Di report  Fox News
  3. Martin Bashir apologizes to Princes William and Harry, saying he 'loved' Diana  New York Post
  4. UK journalist at centre of Diana storm denies link to her death  Reuters UK
  5. A hard lesson from Princess Diana's BBC interview probe  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: マーティン・バシール、独立調査の結果を受けてダイアナ妃の息子たちに謝罪 1995年のインタビューを得るために王室を欺いたことを否定
马丁-巴希尔在独立调查结束后向戴安娜王妃的儿子们道歉；否认为获得1995年的采访而欺骗王室。
馬丁-巴希爾在獨立調查結束後向戴安娜王妃的兒子們道歉；否認爲獲得1995年的採訪而欺騙王室。
